Dated: 02/1112016
AVSEC CIRCULAR
NO. 11/2016
Subject: Permission
for Carriage
OfArms & Ammunition
by the Department
of Home, Govt.
of Jharkhand.
A copy of DGCA Permit No. 541-AAl2016,
issued under reference no.
8/33/2009-IR
dated 19.05.2016 regarding permission to Department of Home, Govt. of Jharkhand to carry or
cause to carry the arms, ammunition and explosives from time to time in helicopter of Govt. of
Jharkhand
Regn. No. VT-HAP
for transportation
of troops in connection
with anti-naxalite
operations in Jharkhand and adjoining States subject to the usual safety conditions, is forwarded
herewith for information and necessary action by all concerned.
2.
Unless suspended or revoked earlier, this permit shall remain valid w.e.f. 01.06.2016 to
31.05.2017.
3.
This issues with the approval of Director General, BCAS.

DGCA COMPLEX,
OPP, SAFDARJUNG
AIRPORT,
NEW DELHI-110003
NO. 8/33/2009-IR
Dated: 19-05-2016
PERMIT NO.541-AA/2016
In exercise of the powers under rule 8 of the Aircrafts Rules, 1937, Department
of Home, Govt. of Jharkhand
is hereby permitted to carry or cause to carry the arms,
ammunition
and explosives from time to time in helicopter of Govt. of Jharkhand
Regn.
No. VT -HAP for transportation
of troops in connection
with anti-naxalite
operations
in
Jharkhand and adjoining States subject to the usual safety conditions.
2.
This permit is valid w.e.f 01-06-2016 to 31-05-2017
(sun)
Kumar)
Director of Regulation & Information

Manager,
Aviation Wing, Department of Home
AAI Hangar No.1 Birsa Munda Airport,
Ranchi.
